      • hsvToColor

        public static Color hsvToColor(float hue,
               float saturation,
               float value)
        Conversion from the HSV color space to Color.
        Parameters:
        hue - Hue of the original color (tint)
        saturation - The amount of color saturation
        value - Value of the current color
        Returns:
        The converted Color

      • hsvToRgb

        public static int hsvToRgb(float hue,
           float saturation,
           float value)
        Converts hue-saturation-value color space to red-green-blue integer value representation.
        Parameters:
        hue - Hue of the original color (tint)
        saturation - The amount of color saturation
        value - Value of the current color
        Returns:
        The integer representation of the Color

      • rgbToInt

        public static int rgbToInt(float r,
           float g,
           float b)
        Converts an RGB color to its integer counterpart
        Parameters:
        r - the red component
        g - the green component
        b - the blue component
        Returns:
        the integer value representing this color

      • intToColor

        public static Color intToColor(int col)
        Creates a Color from an integer value
        Parameters:
        col - the integer color value to convert
        Returns:
        the Color representation of the given integer value
